TextEng: Would you be interested in buying a mummified hand?
Would you be interested in buying a tower statue?
Would you be interested in buying a dragon's tooth?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> It must be worth more than that!
Would you be interested in buying a magical mask?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> This is a very valuable item. Surely you can offer me more?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 아주 귀한 물건이에요. 더 쳐줄 수 있지 않아요?

TextEng: Would you be interested in buying a dragon egg?
I think you might be my problem, with an attitude like that.
I want to ask you some questions.
Who is the "Lady" you spoke of?
I am looking for some stolen magical artifacts. Has anybody tried to sell you any?
Text: 도난당한 마법 유물을 찾고 있어요. 누가 팔려고 한 적 있어요?

TextEng: Do you have any powerful magic items?
Do you know about the gnolls here in the forest?
Did you notice anything else about her?
Text: 그녀에 대해 다른 거 눈치챈 거 있어요?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade - Intimidate]</Start> Tell me your name or I'll have to force it out of you!
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 위협]</Start> 이름을 말해요. 안 그러면 억지로라도 알아낼 거예요!

TextEng: You have the same name as me.
Fine, I'll ask you something else.
What name did your mother call you?
I want you to teleport me somewhere.
Send me to my party leader.
Send me to the kobold caves.
Just show me what you have for sale.
Let me sell you something so I can get enough money.
I do not have enough gold.
Well let me see what I can sell you then.
Text: 그럼 뭘 팔 수 있는지 볼게요.
